titles.title: To amend title I of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to provide church pension plans the opportunity to offer automatic enrollment into the plans, and for other purposes.
To amend title I of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to provide church pension plans the opportunity to offer automatic enrollment into the plans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary: Amends title I of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to allow for automatic enrollment into church pension plans.
